name: Koivu
comment:
An interactive tree representation of [AlloMedia](https://www.allo-media.fr/)'s Customer Path.


# Minimal application setup

    import Koivu
    import Koivu.Tree as Tree
    import Html

    settings : Koivu.Settings
    settings =
        { autoNormalize = False
        , globalQty = 100000
        , minNodeQty = 3000
        , maxChildren = 4
        , maxGlobalQty = 200000
        , maxLevels = 3
        , nodeWidth = 140
        , nodeHeight = 80
        , nodePadding = 10
        }

    main : Program Never Koivu.Model Koivu.Msg
    main =
        Tree.demoTree
            |> Koivu.setup settings
            |> Html.program


# Documentation

@docs Settings, setup, Program, Model, Msg

aliases.name: Model
aliases.type: { root : Koivu.Tree.Node , editedNode : Maybe.Maybe Int , settings : Koivu.Settings }

aliases.name: Program
aliases.type: { init : ( Koivu.Model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd Koivu.Msg ) , subscriptions : Koivu.Model -> Platform.Sub.Sub Koivu.Msg , update : Koivu.Msg -> Koivu.Model -> ( Koivu.Model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd Koivu.Msg ) , view : Koivu.Model -> Html.Html Koivu.Msg }

aliases.name: Settings
aliases.comment:
Koivu settings.

  - `autoNormalize`: enable auto-normalization of the tree
  - `globalQty`: initial global available quantity
  - `minNodeQty`: minimal quantity for a viable tree
  - `maxChildren`: maximum number of children per node
  - `maxGlobalQty`: maximum global available quantity
  - `maxLevels`: maximum depth for the tree
  - `nodeWidth`: node width, in pixels
  - `nodeHeight`: node height, in pixels
  - `nodePadding`: node padding, in pixels

name: Koivu.Tree

aliases.name: NodeInfo
aliases.type: { id : Int , label : String , qty : Int , share : Int , children : List Koivu.Tree.Node }

values.name: allowExpand
values.comment: Check whether a node is allowed to append new children

values.name: appendChild
values.comment: Append a new child to a node identified by its id in a tree

values.name: createNode
values.comment:
Create a new node to be addable to a given tree.

A unique identifier is generated for this node.

values.name: deleteNode
values.comment: Deletes a node from a tree, by its id

values.name: demoTree
values.comment: A sample tree, for demo purpose

values.name: distributeQty
values.comment: Distributes a quantity across all nodes in a tree

values.name: distributeShare
values.comment: Distributes shares to a given node siblings in a tree

values.name: encode
values.comment:
A tree JSON encoder

    demoTree
    |> encode
    |> Json.Encode.encode 2

values.name: findNode
values.comment: Find a node in a tree, by its id

values.name: findNodes
values.comment: Find nodes in a tree, by its id

values.name: getParent
values.comment: Retrieve the parent of a given node in a tree, by its id

values.name: getProp
values.comment: Helper to retrieve a `NodeInfo` property from a node

values.name: getSiblings
values.comment: Retrieve a node siblings identified by its id in a tree

values.name: isUnderfed
values.comment: Checks whether a node has the minimum quantity configured in the `Settings`

values.name: normalize
values.comment: Normalize a tree, ensuring all leaves have a minimum quantity assigned

values.name: updateLabel
values.comment: Update a node label in a tree

values.name: updateShare
values.comment: Update a node share in a tree
